title: NGDIL Demo
description: Set up your profile and get started with your UniMe app.
creator: UniMe

goals.label: Set up your profile
goals.description: Make your UniMe app your own by choosing a profile name and profile picture.

faqs.title: Will this information be shared?
faqs.content: No. Your profile information will never leave your device.

goals.label: Receive your first credential
goals.description: Receive your first credential from a trusted source.

faqs.title: What is a credential?
faqs.content: A credential is like a digital proof that verifies something about you, such as your age, education, or memberships.

goals.label: Use a credential to sign in to a website
